sentences.en: Amid the trees the sea mist was dripping.
sentences.cn: 林子里弥漫着湿漉漉的海雾。

sentences.en: Children were changing classrooms amid laughter and shouts.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在欢笑声和喊叫声中换教室。

sentences.en: Demonstrators ripped up the national flag amid shouts of ‘Death to the tyrants!’
sentences.cn: 示威者在“处死暴君！”的叫喊声中将国旗撕得粉碎。

sentences.en: Dr Amid probed around the sensitive area.
sentences.cn: 阿米德医生在敏感区周围检查。

sentences.en: Dr Amid was assisted by a young Asian nurse.
sentences.cn: 阿米德医生的助手是一位年轻的亚裔护士。

sentences.en: He fled the country amid accusations of fraud.
sentences.cn: 他身陷多项欺诈的控罪,于是潜逃出国.

sentences.en: He had made his point, amid the " hear ! hear! " of his small audience.
sentences.cn: 他在为数不多的听众的 “ 好哇! 好哇! ” 赞许声中讲出了问题的要害.

sentences.en: He was celebrated amid his contemporaries.
sentences.cn: 他在他的同代人中名声显赫.

sentences.en: The army went forth amid great cheering and applause.
sentences.cn: 军队在热烈的欢呼与掌声中行进.

sentences.cn: 军队在热烈的欢呼声中行进.

sentences.en: The dollar has fallen in value amid rumors of weakness in the US economy.
sentences.cn: 在一片美国经济疲软的传言中，美元贬值了。

sentences.en: The house stood amid maple trees.
sentences.cn: 那房子坐落在枫树林中.

sentences.en: The product was launched amid much fanfare worldwide.
sentences.cn: 这个产品在世界各地隆重推出。

sentences.en: The resolution was carried [ passed; adopted ] amid applause.
sentences.cn: 这项 决议 在掌声中获得通过.

sentences.en: They announced, amid much ballyhoo, that they had made a breakthrough.
sentences.cn: 在一通大吹大擂中，他们宣布自己取得了突破。
他们生活在优美的环境中.

sentences.en: This book was written amid many difficulties.
sentences.cn: 这本书是在困难重重中写成的.
